com.ibm.xmi.framework
Class XMIMultiplicity

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.xmi.framework.XMIMultiplicity
public class XMIMultiplicity
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the code to check whether a given string is a legal XML multiplicity, and code to convert multiplicities to XML schema multiplicities and XML DTD multiplicities.

XML schema multiplicities are vectors of two elements: the first element is the lower bound and the second element is the upper bound of the multiplicity.

convert

public static java.lang.String convert(Feature f,
                                       boolean relaxed)
Converts the multiplicity of the given feature to an XML multiplicity. If relaxed is true, multiplicities for relaxed DTDs are returned.
Parameters:
f - A feature
relaxed - True for relaxed multiplicities, false otherwise
Returns:
An XML multiplicity
